resource_dependency.stockDatabaseSchema: Set up a database with fields: stock_id (unique ID), symbol (string), company_name (string), sector (string), industry (string), market_cap (number), last_updated (timestamp).
resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: Requires integration with an external stock market data API such as Alpha Vantage or Yahoo Finance API to fetch real-time stock data.

function: Enable users to search for stocks by entering either the stock code or company name.
static_description: A search bar component centered at the top of the page with a placeholder 'Enter stock code or company name', accompanied by a search icon. Background is white, and the input field border and icon are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search icon or pressing Enter after typing initiates the search process and displays matching results.
Pressing Enter while focused on the input field triggers the search.

resource_dependency.stockSummarySchema: Database view combining stock metadata, latest price, percentage change, and key metrics fetched via external API.

function: Display summarized key information about a selected stock.
static_description: A card-based layout below the search bar showing stock symbol, company name, current price, daily change, market cap, P/E ratio, and dividend yield. Icons accompany each metric. Background is white, cards have navy borders.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on any metric expands a tooltip explaining what the metric means.

resource_dependency.reportTemplateSchema: Set up a database table with fields: template_id (unique ID), name (string), description (text), sections_included (array), created_at (timestamp).
resource_dependency.reportGenerationEngine: Integration with a document generation engine (e.g., Docxtemplater or Google Docs API) to produce formatted reports.
resource_dependency.reportStorage: A storage system (cloud or local) to temporarily store generated reports before download.

function: Generate customized stock reports based on user-selected parameters.
static_description: A dedicated section titled 'Generate Report' featuring buttons for different report templates, a preview area, and a 'Download' button. Background is white, buttons are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a report template button generates the report and displays it in the preview pane. Clicking 'Download' saves the report in the chosen format.

resource_dependency.formatSelectorComponent: Dropdown menu or toggle buttons for selecting report format.

function: Allow users to choose their preferred format for downloading the generated report.
static_description: A dropdown menu labeled 'Format' under the report preview area, pre-populated with options: PDF, Word, Excel, HTML. Background is white, selector is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the dropdown reveals available formats. Selecting one updates the format used when generating the report.

resource_dependency.customizationSchema: Set up a database table with fields: customization_id (unique ID), user_id (optional), selected_sections (array), created_at (timestamp).

function: Provide options for users to customize which sections appear in the generated report.
static_description: Checkboxes beneath the format selector allowing users to select desired content sections: Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data, Analyst Opinions. Default is all checked. Background is white, checkboxes are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a checkbox toggles inclusion of that section in the generated report.

function: Show essential information about the selected stock including symbol, name, sector, etc.
static_description: A vertical list or grid displaying fields: Symbol, Company Name, Sector, Industry, Market Cap, Website URL. Includes a placeholder image if no logo exists. Background is white, text is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the website link opens the companyâ€™s official site in a new tab.

resource_dependency.chartingLibrary: Integration with a charting library like Chart.js or D3.js to visualize market trends.
resource_dependency.trendDataSchema: Database schema storing historical prices and volumes, e.g., date (date), open_price (float), close_price (float), volume (integer)

function: Visualize historical and current market trends for the selected stock.
static_description: An interactive line chart showing price movements over time (durations: 1D, 5D, 1M, 6M, YTD, 1Y, 5Y). X-axis shows dates, Y-axis shows price. Background is white, chart lines are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking duration buttons switches the chart to show data for that period.
Hovering over the chart displays tooltips with exact price and date information.

resource_dependency.financialStatementAPI: An API providing access to quarterly and annual financial statements (income statement, balance sheet, cash flow).
resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database schema with tables: income_statements, balance_sheets, cash_flows, each linked to stock_id.

function: Integrate and display key financial data points from quarterly and annual reports.
static_description: Tabular data showing revenue, net income, EPS, total assets, liabilities, and operating cash flow across multiple quarters. Background is white, headers and text are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts the table by that metric.

function: Apply a consistent white background color throughout the entire website interface.
static_description: All pages and components feature a solid white background (#FFFFFF) to ensure readability and maintain clean aesthetics.

function: Use navy blue as the primary color for interactive and static UI components.
static_description: Buttons, links, input borders, icons, and active states use navy blue (#000080) consistently across the interface.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over buttons or links slightly lightens the navy shade for feedback.

resource_dependency.validationRules: Define rules for acceptable inputs: alphanumeric for symbols, alphabetic for names, max length 100 characters.

function: Validate user input to ensure only valid stock identifiers are accepted during searches.
static_description: Input validation messages displayed beneath the search bar in red font when invalid input is detected. Messages include 'Invalid stock identifier' or 'No matching stock found'.

interaction_and_states.description: If input fails validation, error message appears without initiating search.

resource_dependency.fileDownloadHandler: Client-side script managing file download initiation.

function: Provide users with the ability to export or download generated stock reports in various formats.
static_description: A prominent 'Download Report' button next to the report preview. Label changes dynamically based on selected format (e.g., 'Download PDF'). Background is white, button is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the button triggers browser-native download of the generated report in the selected format.

resource_dependency.realTimeStockAPI: Integration with a live stock data feed API such as Alpha Vantage Real-Time Stock API or IEX Cloud.
resource_dependency.dataPollingInterval: Set interval (e.g., every 60 seconds) to refresh displayed data.

function: Fetch and update stock data in real-time to keep displayed information current.
static_description: Live updating indicators such as timestamps ('Last Updated: Just now') and dynamic value changes shown in charts and summaries. Background remains white, updated values flash briefly.

interaction_and_states.description: Every 60 seconds, the system fetches latest data and updates relevant components silently unless significant changes occur.

resource_dependency.previewRenderer: Built-in HTML/CSS renderer or embedded iframe for displaying generated reports within the browser.
resource_dependency.editablePreviewFields: Identify editable fields within the preview for inline editing (if supported)

function: Offer an interactive preview of the report before final generation and download.
static_description: A scrollable frame below the customization options showing a rendered version of the report. Scrollbar visible if needed. Background is white, report content styled accordingly.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can scroll vertically through the full report preview.
Clicking editable elements allows minor edits directly in the preview (if enabled).

resource_dependency.uiLayoutBlueprint: Define standard spacing units, responsive breakpoints, and alignment guidelines.

function: Ensure the interface is intuitive, accessible, and easy to navigate for all users.
static_description: Clean, grid-based layout with clear navigation menu at the top, ample whitespace between sections, and responsive design ensuring usability on desktop and mobile. Background is white, menus are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Interface adjusts responsively, reflowing content and collapsing menu items into hamburger menu on smaller screens.
Clicking menu items navigates to corresponding sections or pages.
